verses.roman:
saba lokera uthalila ānanda-sāgara
saba loka pāsarila deha-ātma-ghara

synonyms: saba lokera—of every person; uthalila—overflowed; ānanda-sāgara—the ocean of transcendental bliss; saba loka—every person; pāsarila—forgot; deha—body; ātma—mind; ghara—home.
translation: The ocean of transcendental bliss overflowed, and everyone present forgot his body, mind and home.
